welcomeDescription:
Make your first crypto capital
and use it as collateral

home.borrowHint: To borrow you need to deposit any asset to be used as collateral

transaction.notEnoughLiquidity: Not enough tokens available on the market

hints.borrowLimit:
Borrow limit is the maximum sum you can borrow. It is calculated as 80% of your deposited funds.

If you deposit 100$ you won’t be able to borrow more than 80$ which is 80% of 100$.
hints.deposits: Here is your funds on your crypto wallet which is not yet deposited.You can deposit them and use as collateral to borrow funds later.
hints.borrows: Here is funds that you have borrowed. To unlock all your collateral you need to repay this borrowing first.
hints.borrowAvailable:
Here is a list of coins you can borrow and repay later. But you can borrow them only after deposit funds.
Your deposit will be used as collateral. You won’t be able to borrow more than 80% of your deposited funds.
hints.balance: Here is your crypto that you have deposited. You can use them as collateral to borrow funds.

wallet.chooseDisconnection: Are you sure, that you want to disconnect wallet?

connection.notSupported: This network is not supported. Switch to BNB Smart Chain(BSC)
